name: rezagem-booking-system
description: Curbside pickup booking system for Reza Gem Collection

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.build: npm run install:all && npm run build:frontend && npm run copy-build
scripts.build:railway: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && mkdir -p backend/public && cp -r frontend/build/* backend/public/
scripts.build:railway-simple: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && ls -la frontend/dist && mkdir -p backend/public && cp -r frontend/dist/* backend/public/ && cd backend && npm install && ls -la public/
scripts.build:railway-debug: ls -la && ls -la frontend/dist && npm install && cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && mkdir -p backend/public && cp -r frontend/dist/* backend/public/

author: Reza Gem Collection
